trans-unit.source: Provides media playback for drawings.
trans-unit.target: 为绘图提供媒体播放功能。

trans-unit.source: Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code.
trans-unit.target: 虽然你可以将声明中此类的实例[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，则无法加载和播放其媒体而不使用代码。

trans-unit.source: To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在中播放媒体[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]只，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>。

trans-unit.source: Also, if you declare an instance in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the only practical use is to fill property element syntax for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果声明中的某个实例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，唯一的实际用途是将填充的属性元素语法<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource.
trans-unit.target: 使用应用程序分发媒体时，不可将媒体文件用作项目资源。

trans-unit.source: In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`.
trans-unit.target: 在项目文件中，必须改为将媒体类型设置为 `Content` 并将 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 设置为 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the player: independent mode or clock mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> 可在两种不同模式，具体取决于玩家的决定因素： 独立模式还是时钟模式。

trans-unit.source: In independent mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> is analogous to an image and the media opened through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method drives playback.
trans-unit.target: 在独立模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>类似于图像和媒体通过打开<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>方法驱动器播放。

trans-unit.source: In Clock mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> entries in the Timing tree which controls playback.
trans-unit.target: 在时钟模式下，<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>可视为动画的目标，因此它将具有对应的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>计时条目树的控件播放。

trans-unit.source: For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关媒体模式的详细信息，请参阅[多媒体概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> is different from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement> in that it is not a control that can be added directly to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> 不同于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>，因为它不是可以直接添加的控件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: To display media loaded using <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext> must be used.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示使用加载的媒体<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext>必须使用。

trans-unit.source: [How to: Play Media using a VideoDrawing](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-play-media-using-a-videodrawing.md)
trans-unit.target: [如何： 使用 VideoDrawing 播放媒体](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-play-media-using-a-videodrawing.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the balance between the left and right speaker volumes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置左右扬声器音量之间的平衡。

trans-unit.source: The ratio of volume across the left and right speakers in a range between -1 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 介于 -1 到 1 范围内的左右扬声器之间的音量比。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers.
trans-unit.target: 值-1 表示 100%的左侧发言人和 1 表示 100%的右侧发言人。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when buffering has finished.
trans-unit.target: 当完成缓冲时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the percentage of buffering completed for streaming content.
trans-unit.target: 获取为流内容完成的缓冲百分比。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of buffering completed for streaming content represented in a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 用 0 与 1 之间的值表示的为流内容完成的缓冲百分比。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when buffering has started.
trans-unit.target: 当开始缓冲时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the media can be paused.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可暂停媒体。

trans-unit.source: true if the media can be paused; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以暂停媒体，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> to be played.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与要播放的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaClock" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" />。

trans-unit.source: The clock associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> to be played.
trans-unit.target: 与要播放的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline" /> 关联的时钟。

trans-unit.source: The default is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 null。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property tells the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> to be clock driven and will utilize the timing engine, placing the player in Clock mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性告知<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>要时钟驱动，并且将利用计时引擎，同时使播放器处于时钟模式。

trans-unit.source: Any media that is playing is stopped and the <xref:System.Uri> associated with the new clock is opened.
trans-unit.target: 停止任何正在播放的媒体和<xref:System.Uri>与新关联打开时钟。

trans-unit.source: When the player is in clock mode, seeking using <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A> or calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> methods will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 当玩家在时钟模式中，查找使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A>或调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A>方法都会引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: These operations are only available when the player <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> is null.
trans-unit.target: 这些操作才可用玩家<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" />.
trans-unit.target: 使此实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 的深层副本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> to clone.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" />。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a modifiable deep copy of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> using current property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前的属性值使该实例成为指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Closes the underlying media.
trans-unit.target: 关闭基础媒体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> can be opened again by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>可以通过调用再次打开<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the percentage of download progress for content located at a remote server.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于远程服务器上的内容的下载进度百分比。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of download progress for content located at a remote server represented by a value between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 位于远程服务器上的内容的下载进度百分比，由介于 0 与 1 之间的值来表示。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> object to clone and freeze.
trans-unit.target: 要克隆和冻结的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Makes this instance a clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 使该实例成为指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer" /> 对象的复本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if these properties contain resource references or data bindings, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> will fail when trying to freeze the object and will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>将失败时尝试冻结该对象，并将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。

trans-unit.source: To create a frozen copy of the current object, call <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A> instead of calling this method directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicating whether the media has audio output.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示媒体是否具有音频输出。

trans-unit.source: true if the media has audio output; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体具有音频输出，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media has video output.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示媒体是否具有视频输出。

trans-unit.source: true if the media has video output; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体具有视频输出，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media is buffering.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示媒体是否正在缓冲。

trans-unit.source: true if the media is buffering; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体正在缓冲，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the media is muted.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示媒体是否被静音。

trans-unit.source: true if the media is muted; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体被静音，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the media has finished playback.
trans-unit.target: 在媒体完成播放时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error is encountered
trans-unit.target: 当遇到错误时发生

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the media is opened.
trans-unit.target: 在打开媒体时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: 获取媒体的自然持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The natural duration of the media.
trans-unit.target: 媒体的自然持续时间。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.NaturalDuration%2A> cannot be determined until after <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.MediaOpened> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.NaturalDuration%2A> 不能确定直到后<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.MediaOpened>发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel height of the video.
trans-unit.target: 获取视频的像素高度。

trans-unit.source: The pixel height of the video.
trans-unit.target: 视频的像素高度。

trans-unit.source: Null is returned if the media type is audio.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体类型是音频，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pixel width of the video.
trans-unit.target: 获取视频的像素宽度。

trans-unit.source: The pixel width of the video.
trans-unit.target: 视频的像素宽度。

trans-unit.source: Null is returned if the media type is audio.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒体类型是音频，则返回 null。

trans-unit.source: The media source <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 媒体源 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Opens the given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for media playback.
trans-unit.target: 打开给定的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 以进行媒体播放。

trans-unit.source: Pauses media playback.
trans-unit.target: 暂停媒体播放。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A> when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A>时播放器都有一个相关<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A> cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Pause%2A> 不能调用计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。

trans-unit.source: Plays media from the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position" />.
trans-unit.target: 从当前 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position" /> 播放媒体。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>时播放器都有一个相关<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> 不能调用计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the media.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置媒体的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the media.
trans-unit.target: 媒体的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: If the player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>, setting <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果玩家都有一个相关<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A> cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Position%2A> 不能设置计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中通常使用不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the MediaPlayer is being accessed from a valid thread.
trans-unit.target: 确保正在从有效线程中访问 MediaPlayer。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a script command has been encountered within the media.
trans-unit.target: 当在媒体中遇到脚本命令时发生。

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether scrubbing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了拖动播放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scrubbing is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了擦除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the media <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取媒体 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The current media <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前媒体 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Source%2A> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Source%2A> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: This property gets the <xref:System.Uri> that is opened through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> method or the <xref:System.Uri> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取<xref:System.Uri>打开的通过<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>方法或<xref:System.Uri>与关联<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ratio of speed that media is played at.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置媒体的播放速率。

trans-unit.source: The ratio of speed that media is played back represented by a value between 0 and the largest double value.
trans-unit.target: 由 0 与最大双精度数值之间的值所表示的媒体播放速率。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Values less than one yield slower than normal playback while values greater than one yields faster than normal playback.
trans-unit.target: 值小于一个产生比正常播放，而大于一个产生比正常播放快值慢。

trans-unit.source: If the player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>, setting <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.SpeedRatio%2A> is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果玩家都有一个相关<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.SpeedRatio%2A>不允许。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.SpeedRatio%2A> cannot be set while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.SpeedRatio%2A> 不能设置计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。

trans-unit.source: Audio playback is not guaranteed when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A> is not `1`.
trans-unit.target: 音频播放不保证时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement.SpeedRatio%2A>不`1`。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中通常使用不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Stops media playback.
trans-unit.target: 停止媒体播放。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> when a player has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A> will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A>时播放器都有一个相关<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Clock%2A>将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> cannot be called while the timing engine drives media playback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Stop%2A> 不能调用计时引擎驱动媒体播放时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the media's volume.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置媒体的音量。

trans-unit.source: The media's volume represented on a linear scale between 0 and 1.
trans-unit.target: 在 0 与 1 之间的线性标尺上所表示的媒体音量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.5.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0.5。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.source: Not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中通常使用不[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the MediaPlayer is not frozen and that it is being accessed from a valid threading context.
trans-unit.target: 验证 MediaPlayer 是否未被冻结，并且是否正在从有效的线程上下文中访问它。
